metadata.description: Dialog Driven Delivery (D3) - Conversational, transcript-first methodology for building software products

plugins.name: d3
plugins.description: Dialog Driven Delivery - Create specs, refine them, and decompose into user stories through conversational workflows

plugins.name: d3-atlassian
plugins.description: Atlassian provider for D3 - Enables D3 to work with Confluence for specifications and Jira for user stories

plugins.name: d3-markdown
plugins.description: Markdown provider for D3 - Local-first provider using markdown files for specs and stories. Perfect for solo developers and small teams. No SaaS required.
